details.title: Fuzzy logic approach for prioritisation of radar tasks and sectors of surveillance in multifunction radar

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Electr. Eng., Univ. Coll. London
authors.name: S.L.C. Miranda

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Electr. Eng., Univ. Coll. London
authors.name: C.J. Baker

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Electr. Eng., Univ. Coll. London
authors.name: K. Woodbridge

details.abstract: The effective allocation of radar resources is essential if multifunction radars are to realise their full potential. In the most stressing conditions, there will be insufficient resources to carry out all the desired radar functions. Therefore the ranking of radar tasks is an important sub-problem for radar resource management, particularly as resource allocation is likely to be based on the relative importance of radar tasks. The development of an adaptive prioritisation assignment, fuzzy-reasoning-based algorithm used for ranking targets and sectors of surveillance in dynamically changing tactical environments has been addressed. The performance of this approach is compared with that of other prioritisation methods based on more conventional `hard decision logic' and simple fixed prioritisation

ieee.title: Frequency management in multiposition radar systems
ieee.displayText: Vitalii Vovk, Igor Prokopenko, Serhii Stavytskyi, Valerii Medvediev, Bohdan Stavytskyi, "Frequency management in multiposition radar systems", Radar Methods and Systems Workshop (RMSW) IEEE, pp. 126-131, 2016.

ieee.title: Optimization of use of resource in multi-position radar systems
ieee.displayText: Igor Prokopenko, Vitalii Vovk, Sergey Stavitsky, Valeriy Medvedev, "Optimization of use of resource in multi-position radar systems", Microwaves Radar and Remote Sensing Symposium (MRRS) 2014 IEEE, pp. 92-97, 2014.

ieee.title: Fast resource management algorithm for multi-position radar systems
ieee.displayText: Igor Prokopenko, Vitalii Vovk, Kostiantyn Prokopenko, "Fast resource management algorithm for multi-position radar systems", Radar Symposium (IRS) 2015 16th International, pp. 1045-1051, 2015.

ieee.title: A survey of radar resource management algorithms
ieee.displayText: Zhen Ding, "A survey of radar resource management algorithms", Electrical and Computer Engineering 2008. CCECE 2008. Canadian Conference on, pp. 001559-001564, 2008, ISSN 0840-7789.

ieee.title: Non-myopic optimization-based algorithm for scheduling in ESA radars

ieee.title: Bandwidth sharing and scheduling for multimodal radar with communications and tracking
ieee.displayText: Surendra S. Bhat, Ram M. Narayanan, Muralidhar Rangaswamy, "Bandwidth sharing and scheduling for multimodal radar with communications and tracking", Sensor Array and Multichannel Signal Processing Workshop (SAM) 2012 IEEE 7th, pp. 233-236, 2012, ISSN 2151-870X.
